header.rec_loc: A car journey from St Anne's on-the-sea to Preston
header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Directions, The Hay festival, Books/stories. Illness/Pregnancy, talk about the past/childhood, shopping, train strikes, exams, the Queen, moving house process, supermarkets, shops
header.activity: Family talks during a car journey to the shops
header.conv_type: Discussing, Explaining, Advising, Anecdote telling, Making Arrangements
